description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the checkout screen in a food delivery app. It manages the UI for reviewing cart items and placing an order, using provider for state management.

classes.name: CheckoutScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the checkout screen where users can review their cart and place an order.

methods.name: _placeOrder
methods.description: Handles the order placement process: initiates order, updates UI state, clears cart on success, and navigates to the orders screen.
